item.title: Disgrace amounts of rubbish and fly tipping along side of north circular road, 25th February
item.description:
Totally unacceptable levels of littering and fly tipping on side of North circular Road. This has to be cleared up otherwise it will just keep getting worse and it will feel like a Third World country.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near M&S when Driving from Kilburn Lane to Carlton Vale, 25th February
item.description:
If you’re driving from Kilburn lane towards Carlton vale, joining oncoming traffic from Salusbury Road, just as you approach M&S in front of you, there is a very large and deep pothole at an extremely dangerous part of the road, where traffic is merging in a roundabout.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council contractor fly-tipping, 25th February
item.description:
This pile of old tarmac has been there for a week following the resurfacing of Great Elms Rd. It is on a very busy blind bend and causing considerable obstruction in a location where parking is not permitted at any time. It is unlit so especially hazardous after dark.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marlborough Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose manhole (surrounding road cracked), 25th February
item.description:
Opposite Superdrug, the asphalt around a manhole cover is cracked and uneven. The cover is loose and rattles loudly when vehicles pass. The noise is getting worse and the damage is growing daily.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walworth Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
